src_original: [SaSū 27] atha khalu sarvaśuro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavato 'ntikāttadutsāhaṃ śrutvā bhagavantametadavocat - kiyantaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 爾時一切勇菩薩白佛言。 世尊。 若有眾生聞此法者壽命幾劫。

src_original: bhagavān āha /
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: caturaśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇi teṣāṃ sattvānāmāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 壽命滿八十劫。

src_original: [SaSū 28] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - kiyantaṃ bhagavan kalpasya pramāṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 一切勇白佛言。 劫以何量。

src_original: bhagavān āha - śṛṇu kulaputra /
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma sarvaśūra kaścideva puruṣo nagaraṃ kārayeddvādaśayojanāyāmavistāraṃ ūrdhvena trīṇi yojanāni pramāṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 譬如大城縱廣十二由旬高三由旬盛滿胡麻。 有長壽人過百歲已取一而去。

src_original: tacca nagaraṃ tilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ kuryāt (sa ca puruṣa śirajīvī syāt)
tgt_original: 如是城中胡麻悉盡。

src_original: atha sa puruṣo varṣaśatasyātyayāttatastilaphalakaiḥ paripūrṇānnagarād ekaṃ tilaphalakaṃ  bahirnikṣipedanena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṇi tāni tilaphalakāni kṣayaṃ kuryāt  paryavadānaṃ kuryāt tacca nagaramamūlamapratiṣṭhānāṃ bhavenna cādyāpi ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta //  [SaSū 29] punaraparaṃ sarvaśūra (aparāṃ te upamā kariṣyāmyasyaivārthasya prasiddhaye /
tgt_original: 劫猶不盡。

src_original: ) tadyathāpi nāma parvato bhavet paṃcaviṃśad yojanāni pramāṇena dvādaśa yojanānyūrdhvena /
tgt_original: 又如大山縱廣二十五由旬高十二由旬。

src_original: atha kaścideva puruṣastasya parvatasya pārśve gṛhaṃ kārayet sa dīrghasyādhvano varṣaśatasyātyayena
tgt_original: 有長壽人過一百歲以輕繒帛一往拂之。

src_original: kāśikena vastreṇaikavārā parimārjayedevaṃ kṛtvā tasya parvatasya kṣayo bhavenna ca kalpaṃ kṣīyeta /  etatsarvaśūra kalpasya pramāṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 如是山盡劫猶不盡。

src_original: bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat
tgt_original: 時有一切勇菩提薩埵白佛言。 世尊。

src_original: sarve te tathāgatagocarapariniṣpattaye pariniṣpadyante /
tgt_original: 此會眾生得發菩提。

src_original: [SaSū 24] sarvaśūro bodhisattva āha - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yadete sattvā  ihagatvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyante bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu sarvaśūra  yastvaṃ tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase /  tena hi sarvaśūra śṛṇu /  iha sarvaśura pariṇāmanaviśeṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 佛言。

src_original: [SaSū 25] bhūtapūrvaṃ sarvaśūrātīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairyadāpi tena kālena  tena samayena ratnaśrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loko udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
tgt_original: 一切勇。 乃往過去無數阿僧祇劫有佛世尊。 號曰寶德。

src_original: [SaSū 26] tena khalu punaḥ sarvaśūra kālenāhaṃ māṇāvako bhūvan ye sattvāḥ sāṃprataṃ
tgt_original: 我時作摩納之子。

src_original: mayā buddhajñāne pratiṣṭhapitāste sarve tena kālena tena samayena mṛgā abhūvan tena
tgt_original: 此會眾生住佛智慧者。

src_original: ca kālena tena samayenāhamevaṃ praṇidhānamakārṣīd ye kecin mṛgāḥ sāṃprataṃ duḥkhena
tgt_original: 往昔之時悉在鹿中。 我時發願。

src_original: paripīḍitāḥ ete sarve mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran sarvāṃśca tānahaṃ buddhajñāne
tgt_original: 如是諸鹿我皆令住佛智慧中。

src_original: pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ te ca mṛgāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - evaṃ bhavatu;
tgt_original: 時鹿聞已尋皆發願得如是。
